testcase.name: My Info ContactUs Details Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User opens browser....................................................passed When User launches URL "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login".passed And User enter Email as "Admin" and Password as "admin123"..................passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then Page Home page Title should be "OrangeHRM".............................passed And User clicks on MyInfo option............................................passed And User clicks on Contact details option...................................passed Then User can view contact details..........................................passed And User enters Street1 details.............................................passed And User enters State details...............................................passed And User enters Zipcode Deatis..............................................passed And User selects country from dropdown......................................passed And User enters mobile number...............................................passed Then User clicks on save button.............................................passed
